Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CubicSpline::CubicSpline ( const double  supportlength  ) 

constructor to initialize the data members (auxiliary factors for kernel calculation)

Cubic spline kernel (see Liu eq. (3.6).

Member Function Documentation

Vec2d CubicSpline::gradW ( const double  distance,
const Vec2d &  distanceVector 
) const [virtual]

Calculates the kernel derivation for the given distance of two particles.

We take this from Morris, Fox and Zhu (1997) but used a tripled smoothing length for the definition of the interaction radius.

Implements Kernel.

Here is the call graph for this function:

double CubicSpline::w ( const double  distance  )  const [virtual]

Calculates the kernel value for the given distance of two particles.

We take this from Morris, Fox and Zhu (1997) but used a tripled smoothing length for the definition of the interaction radius.

Implements Kernel.
